snippet: Flights will begin Dec. 10 with nonstop service to Fort Lauderdale and Orlando.
abstract: JetBlue Airways announces plans to begin daily service between Albany International Airport and two destinations in Florida later in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Flights will begin Dec. 10 with nonstop service to Fort Lauderdale and Orlando.

headline.main: JetBlue to Add Daily Service Between Albany and Florida
headline.print_headline: JetBlue to Add Daily Service Between Albany and Florida
